TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: We finally found the Eye...
SOLANUM: Thank you for your knowlage, now we know exactly the reason why it was not as easy to find.

SOLANUM: Eye of the universe have lured not only us, but also other intelligent life forms.. and we know what happened. I don't want to know anything more about it.. Even in childhood I knew that it's not waiting for us..
SOLANUM: Is that Memory Statue active?! It's working! I need to check it's connection with Ash Twin Project. Find me there.
